name: CBETrivia
0:
”Alexa open CBE Trivia”
”Alexa ask CBE Trivia for a fact”
”Alexa tell CBE Trivia to tell me trivia”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: c. b. e. trivia
des:
CBE Trivia provides fun the whole family can enjoy and is guaranteed to make you smarter.

To start, just say "Alexa, launch CBE Trivia" or "Alexa, open CBE Trivia" to get a fact".

At anytime, you can stop by saying "Alexa, stop"
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
